# As Rich Demur, Biden Plays Up Smaller Donors

But He Still Courts, and Needs, Big Backers

BY KENNETH P. VOGEL

WASHINGTON — In a nationally broadcast interview on Monday, President Biden poured back on to CBS. Responding who wants him to end his reelection campaign, saying, “I don’t care what the millions think.”

Small donors, he made clear, were coming through for him.
